entry.title: Oscars Review!
entry.content: www.youtube.com Click here to watch our Google Glass PARODY! Oscars Review! Khail here, We thought the Oscars was alright this year. Nothing too crazy but still, Seth brought a youthful spirit to a droll teleprompter driven celebration of already famous people. entry.title: Ultimate Soldier Challenge Episode 4 -- Tannerite (Featuring Richard Ryan)
entry.content: Missed an Episode, get caught up here: bit.ly Ultimate Soldier Challenge Episode 4 -- Tannerite (Featuring Richard Ryan) One of the keys to giving each episode of USC the big explosive feel of a real military completion show is the use of explosive targets. Targets that are filled with Tannerite explode when a bullet passes through them. They are quite spectacular and are often captured in all their high-speed glory. They serve a practical purpose as well. When a sniper competition is based around hitting a target in the head that's 500 yards, no one will wonder if it was hit if it's filled with Tannerite! Trust us on that one! FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com WANT TO JOIN THE MACHINIMA AFFILIATE PROGRAM? entry.title: Ultimate Soldier Challenge Episode 3 -- Contractors
entry.content: Missed an Episode, get caught up here: bit.ly Ultimate Soldier Challenge Episode 3 -- Contractors What makes these tough guys tick? Most contractors were former military operators, but unlike most of their brothers in arms who couldn't wait to go home, these guys returned to the war zones that most people would avoid at all costs. Do they do this just for the money as most people think, or is it for more noble reasons? The answers may surprise you. Nearly all of the contractors who appeared on USC were real characters, including Shannon Rich, the MMA fighter who has more wins that anyone who has ever stepped into the octagon. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com WANT TO JOIN THE MACHINIMA AFFILIATE PROGRAM? entry.title: Dungeons & Dragons Neverwinter Preview - Inside Gaming
entry.content: www.youtube.com Click here to watch Neverwinter -- The Siege of Neverwinter Trailer Dungeons & Dragons Neverwinter Preview - Inside Gaming Dungeons and Dragons collides with free to play in Cryptic Studios' Neverwinter. entry.title: Watch Dogs Coming To PS4 - Inside Gaming
entry.content: www.youtube.com Click here to watch Mass Effect 3 FINAL DLC Announced - Inside Gaming News Desk PS4 Interview: Watch Dogs - Inside Gaming The next gen wave is beginning to swell.
